notes:
The UNHCR Refugee Population statistics are compiled and curated at headquarters-level and released yearly at the same time of the UNHCR Statistical Yearbooks. This is a subset of the data **only with refugees from Kenya**. The full dataset is available [here](http://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/unhcr-refugee-population-statistics).

This dataset contains refugee population statistics from 1975 until 2012.
